channel.title: Need super experienced coder
channel.description:
Ok. I really do need a supercoder here.
Firstly, i need a way to make everywhere pking/nonpking with a command Secondly, i need a correct Char interface Thirdly, a spell (or a command with some animation) that kills anybody around you instantly Fourthly and lastly, a code so that a specific account can see everything said nomatter where (can be very helpfull to find scammers/dupers)
I hope it is not too much for you. Even if you can only get one of them, thats OK.

item.title: Need super experienced coder
item.dc:creator: @Noob_Slayerz Noob Slayerz
item.description:
@Noob_Slayerz wrote:

[quote=“mikescott, post:10, topic:167002”]First: easy, do it yourself.
Second: showInterface(3559);
Thirdly: Make the hitdiff of a spell 99 with no misc.random
Fourthly and lastly: Make a chat log…?[/quote]
Third : WRONG!
Fouth/Last: NOT WAT HE WANTED.
First: YOU SUCK
Second: DONT COPY AND PASTE FROM EXPERTS

Read full topic

item.title: Need super experienced coder
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

I can do all that, if you give me an hour, but i’m not going to do that.

You do it…

Like a command, that sets the boolean to true, and you would add in pking packet, and attacking, so it would be safe zone.

Correct Char interface?

showInterface(3559);

You can always use the holy force on. Add case under clicking most things or whatever it is called with the animation.

fourth? Its called character files.
